Command.CommandString: SELECT * FROM CMD_Warehouse where {0} order by WarehouseCode
DELETE FROM CMD_WAREHOUSE WHERE WarehouseCode={0}
Insert into CMD_WAREHOUSE (WarehouseCode,WarehouseName,MEMO) values(@WarehouseCode,@WarehouseName,@MEMO)
update CMD_WAREHOUSE set WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,WarehouseName=@WarehouseName,MEMO=@MEMO where WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode
update CMD_Area set WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaName=@AreaName,Memo=@Memo Where AreaCode=@AreaCode
delete from CMD_Area Where AreaCode in({0})
insert into CMD_Area(WareHouseCode,AreaCode,AreaName,Memo) values(@WareHouseCode,@AreaCode,@AreaName,@Memo)
insert into CMD_Region(WareHouseCode,AreaCode,RegionCode,RegionName,Memo) values(@WareHouseCode,@AreaCode,@RegionCode,@RegionName,@Memo)
update CMD_Region set AreaCode=@AreaCode,RegionCode=@RegionCode,RegionName=@RegionName,Memo=@Memo Where RegionCode=@RegionCode
delete from CMD_Region Where RegionCode in({0})

select c.*,CMD_Area.AreaName,CMD_Region.RegionName,CMD_ProductDetail.SectionName,CMD_Product.ProductName from CMD_Cell c left join CMD_Region on CMD_Region.RegionCode=c.RegionCode LEFT join CMD_Area on CMD_Region.AreaCode=cmd_area.AreaCode left join CMD_ProductDetail on CMD_ProductDetail.ProductCode=c.PalletBarCode and CMD_ProductDetail.RowID=c.SectionID left join CMD_Product on CMD_Product.ProductCode=CMD_ProductDetail.ProductCode where {0} order by {1}

if not exists(select * from Cmd_Cell where @CellCode='') insert into Cmd_CEll Values(@CellCode,@CellName,'001'+SUBSTRING(@CellCode,1,3),@AreaCode,@RegionCode,SUBSTRING(@CellCode,7,3),SUBSTRING(@CellCode,4,3),SUBSTRING(@CellCode,10,1),'','',@IsActive,1,1,1,@IsLock,0,'',@Indate,@Memo,@PalletBarCode,'',@BatchNo,@SectionID,@Qty)
update CMD_Cell set AreaCode=@AreaCode,RegionCode=@RegionCode where CellCode in ({0})

update Cmd_cell set IsActive=@IsActive,@IsLock=@IsLock,CellName=@CellName,AreaCode=@AreaCode,RegionCode=@RegionCode,PalletBarCode=@PalletBarCode,Indate=@Indate,Qty=@Qty,BatchNo=@BatchNo,SectionID=@SectionID Where CellCode=@CellCode
delete from CMD_Cell Where CellCode in({0})
Sp_GetChangeRegionQty
select * from CMD_BillType where {0} order by TaskType
insert into CMD_ProductCategory(CategoryCode,CategoryName,Memo,Creator,CreateDate,Updater,UpdateDate) values(@CategoryCode,@CategoryName,@Memo,@Creator,getdate(),@Updater,getdate())
update CMD_ProductCategory set CategoryName=@CategoryName,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where CategoryCode=@CategoryCode
delete from CMD_ProductCategory where CategoryCode in({0})
delete from CMD_PRODUCT WHERE ProductCode in({0})
delete from CMD_PRODUCTDetail WHERE ProductCode in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_PRODUCT(ProductCode, ProductName, CategoryCode,Memo,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@ProductCode, @ProductName, @CategoryCode,@Memo,@Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
INSERT INTO CMD_PRODUCTDetail(ProductCode, RowID, RegionCode,SectionName,GrowDay,PreQty) values(@ProductCode, @RowID, @RegionCode,@SectionName,@GrowDay,@PreQty)
Update CMD_PRODUCT Set ProductName=@ProductName, CategoryCode=@CategoryCode,Memo=@Memo, Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where ProductCode=@ProductCode
Select a.AreaName,r.RegionName as RegionName,p.* from CMD_PRODUCTDetail p left join CMD_Region r on p.RegionCode=r.RegionCode left join CMD_Area a on a.AreaCode=r.AreaCode WHERE {0}
sp_BatchChangeProductNo
select * from Cmd_ProductDetail where {0}
select * from CMD_Device where {0}
update CMD_Device set DeviceType=@DeviceType,State=@State,DeviceName=@DeviceName,AlarmCode=@AlarmCode,ServiceName=@ServiceName,Memo=@Memo where DeviceNo=@DeviceNo
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE WarehouseCode = @WareHouse ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE AREACODE = @AreaCode ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE {0} ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
